summary: Adds black variants of 15 pieces of Shrouded Armors to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Explanation:
I really loved these retextures by [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5275607/]redtox[/url][/b] and so I couldn't choose from the two so I made this plugin and wanted to share it. Please don't forget to leave redtox an endorsement on his retexture pages and kudos on his profile, he deserves it!

[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/0m1SsSq.gif[/img][/center]
[size=3][b]
Required:[/b][/size]
[size=5][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82520/?]Dark Brotherhood HD armor retexture[/url][/b][/size]
by [size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5275607/]redtox[/url][/b][/size]

[size=3][b]Features:[/b][/size]
-This mod will add black versions of 15 Vanilla Shrouded items (check list below). This maybe incompatible with mods that replace the vanilla mesh with a different mesh structure(I'm using [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65831/]CBBE bodyslided-HDT[/url][/b]).
-[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]USLEEP/USKP[/url][/b] version for male mesh is available as optional file. See the [i]2nd [/i]and [i]3rd [/i]male khajiit [i]screenshots [/i]for comparison.
-Also compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43053/?][b]Clothing and Clutter Fixes[/b][/url]' cowl meshes for beast races as this patch is only adding textures and does not replace any models.
-Adds recipes to turn a DB Armor into its Black version and vis-a-vis in the Tanning Rack (CCOR armor light toggles) that requires you are a member of the Dark Brotherhood.
-Having [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/][b]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/b][/url] installed will show [i][b]more Immersive [/b][/i]recipes (Dark Leather for remodeling to black required and Red/Crimson Leather for remodeling back to original) as well as their tempering recipes will follow CCOR temper recipes(Dark leather for all parts).
-Edits the World Encounter DB Assassin's Outfit to have a chance of wearing a Black DB armor set.
-The naming, stats of the armors are consistent and compatible with [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapon and Armor Fixes Remade[/url][/b],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28418/?] [b]Stealth Skills Rebalanced[/b][/url] mods by [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291352]kryptopyr[/url][/b].
-The remodeled version allows you to turn the black armor parts into a 'Remodeled' version using models from ChronoTrigger77's [i][u]standalone[/u][/i] version of the mod: [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT[/url][/b].

[size=3][b]Installation:
[/b][/size][list=1]
[*][size=2]Get the main retexture file from redtox's page (link is shown in the biggest blue letters)[/size]
[*][size=2]Download and install this mod's main file and install redtox's main file in that order.(I accidentally bundled the 2k main files from redtox so if you want his 4k, install that after).[/size]

[*][size=2]If you want the 4k Black textures, you need to manually install it in your Data folder path is:textures\armor\dbarmor\black\.[/size]
[*][size=2]And your done, thank you![/size]

[/list]
Item ids:[spoiler]
Enchanted:
Shrouded Armor    XX000805
Shrouded Boots XX000806
Shrouded Gloves XX00080A
Shrouded Masked Cowl XX00080F
Shrouded Cowl XX000810
Shrouded Armor XX000814 (Short Sleeved)
Ancient Shrouded Armor XX000815
Ancient Shrouded Boots XX000807
Ancient Shrouded Gloves XX00080C
Ancient Shrouded Masked Cowl XX000811
Tumblerbane Gloves XX00080B
Unenchanted:
Shrouded Armor XX000817
Shrouded Boots XX000809
Shrouded Gloves XX00080E
Shrouded Masked Cowl XX000813
[/spoiler]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71063/?]-Facelight Plus[/url]

[size=4][size=2][b]Personal Note:[/b]
[i]Do tell me or any mod author if you liked or enjoyed the mods we offer by leaving a comment, posting a screnshot or just clicking the endorse button to our respectful modpages. This really helps a lot in telling us we are doing something right ... or wrong? Either one, do tell. Please? Basically begging here in need of much attention.. just kidding! No, really, do leave a comment if you feel like it, I don't bite. [/i][/size][/size]

Permissions:
I do not hold the rights to share or permit others to use the texture bundled in this mod that are created by redtox and has been allowed to be here with his permission, you must ask him for permission if you want to use them for your mod.
[b]Credits:[/b]
